#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
char pattern[5000005];
int F[5000005];
int m,n,c=0;
void build()
{
  int i,j;
  F[0] = F[1] = 0; 
  for(i = 2; i <= m; i++) 
  {
    j = F[i - 1];
    for( ; ; ) 
     {
	if(pattern[j] == pattern[i - 1])
	{ 
		F[i] = j + 1; break; 
	}
	if(j == 0) 
	{ 
		F[i] = 0; break;
	}
	j = F[j];
     }
   }   
}
int main()
{
	scanf("%s",pattern);
	m=strlen(pattern);
	while(strcmp(pattern,"End")!=0)
	{
		m=strlen(pattern);
		build();
		for(int i=1;i<=m;i++)
			cout<<F[i]<<" ";
		cout<<"\n";
		getchar();
		scanf("%s",pattern);
	}	
	return 0;
}
